name: Minoes (Demo)
description:
Minoes is an upcoming puzzle game for PC and Console. It's based on the idea that Tetris is the greatest game ever made, polyominoes are cool and originality is where you make it. 

"Minoes is a Tetris-like Stack-em-up with a Rubik's Cube thrown in."

Supports keyboard or controller.

Enjoy the demo and please send bugs/feedback to harry@modacodegames.com
